author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: Infinitely loop with Reverberate targeting Reverberate
content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on August 14, 2012 20:52:43_

Reported by Aswan jaguar @ http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=3735&p=95909&sid=f8e6106afad9816898bf41b2a9eb5f6f#p95909 Game went on an infinite loop when AI targeted mine Reverberate with his Reverberate (with no effect?) and then re-targeting my Reverbate again and again,endlessly.

I wasn't allowed to reset, only to concede a game that with this combo I had a certain victory.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=276_
